title: City of Light
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson City of light par Palatine
What is this thing?
Is this a man climbing up a tree?
I'm gonna do the same
Away the water flows
Await the beautiful
Back to the city
Back to the same old

The city of light
You're all I see
And now the long
Is gone

There is this old way to ???
And walking shatters
Each others eyes

I see the ghost
And I see the bones
Under a road
I'm going, I'm going

The city of light
You're all I see
And now the long
Is gone

From the inner city
I forsake the streets I'd known
I go cause I love you
I go cause I love you girl

I go cause I love you
I go cause I love you girl


I go cause I love you
I go cause I love you girl
